author: agilliland
msg: converting weblog entry anchors to base64 in cache keys.  it appears that some anchors still end up with spaces in them, which is not desirable.

author: husted
msg: * BindListControl - Check for list pointer (--v--) on postbacks too, in case the list changes dynamically
* Add special handling for DataGrid's with template columns

author: jta
msg: DERBY-608 Applied Eric Radzinski's patch that updates the Reference Guide to
reflect support for dynamic parameters for unary +/-.

author: sboden
msg: Replace ibatis.com by ibatis.apache.org in most places, refresh of PDFs

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-435 patch 3 continuing work to bring checkDataSource into client testing
This patch disables some instances of setTransactionIsolation for client because it causes a statement closed exception in some contexts.
This bug makes it hard to analyse the isolation testing in this test with client.
Also exposes a bug that client returns an invalid connection for Statement.getConnection for connections obtained from a connection pool datasource.
No change to the embedded tests and not yet enabled for client.
